com.vector.cfg.automation.api

Class Converters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vector.cfg.automation.api.Converters

  • @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public final class Converters
extends java.lang.Object
    Converters provides general purpose Functions performing value conversions used throughout the automation interface.
    Converters provides general purpose Functions performing value conversions used throughout the automation interface. These converters are referenced from the AutomationInterface documentation wherever they apply. The AutomationInterface is typed strongly. In some cases, however, e.g. when specifying file locations, it is desirable to allow for a range of possibly parameter types. This is achieved by accepting parameters of type Object and converting the given parameters to the desired type.

    The following converters are provided:

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

    • Field Detail

      • TO_MDF

        @PublishedField
public static final java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Object,ru.novosoft.mdf.ext.MDFObject> TO_MDF
        Attempts to convert arbitrary Objects to MDFObjects.
        TO_MDF
        Attempts to convert arbitrary Objects to MDFObjects. The following conversions are implemented:
        • For null or MDFObject arguments the given argument is returned. No conversion is applied.
        • IHasModelObjects are converted using their #getMdfModelElement() method.
        • IViewedModelObjects are converted using their #getMdfObject() method.
        • For all other Objects ClassCastExceptions are thrown.
        For thrown Exceptions see the used functions described above.

      • TO_PATH

        @PublishedField
public static final java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Object,java.nio.file.Path> TO_PATH
        Attempts to convert arbitrary Objects to Paths.
        TO_PATH
        Attempts to convert arbitrary Objects to Paths using
        IAutomationPathsApi.resolvePath(Object) .

      • TO_SCRIPT_PATH

        @PublishedField
public static final java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Object,java.nio.file.Path> TO_SCRIPT_PATH
        Attempts to convert arbitrary Objects to Paths.
        TO_SCRIPT_PATH
        Attempts to convert arbitrary Objects to Paths using IAutomationPathsApi.resolveScriptPath(Object) .

      • TO_VERSION

        @PublishedField
public static final java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Object,IVersion> TO_VERSION
        Attempts to convert arbitrary Objects to IVersions.
        TO_VERSION
        Attempts to convert arbitrary Objects to IVersions. The following conversions are implemented:
        • For null or IVersion arguments the given argument is returned. No conversion is applied.
        • Strings are converted using Version.valueOf(String).
        • Numbers are converted by converting the int obtained from Number.intValue() using Version.valueOf(int).
        • All other Objects are converted by converting the String obtained from Object.toString().
        For thrown Exceptions see the used functions described above.
